meanings.sent1: The movie was the sappiest thing I've ever seen, with tears flowing throughout.
meanings.sent2: She always cries at the sappiest scenes in romantic movies.
meanings.sent3: His sappiest moments involve writing love poems to his pet goldfish.
meanings.sent4: The sappiest songs make you feel like you're floating on a cloud of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The sappiest memories are often the ones that stay with us forever.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of good judgment or common sense
meanings.sent1: It was the sappiest decision to go hiking without a map in the dark.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring the weather forecast was the sappiest thing he could have done.
meanings.sent3: His sappiest move was trying to fix the leaky faucet with duct tape.
meanings.sent4: Choosing to swim in shark-infested waters was the sappiest choice she made.
meanings.sent5: The sappiest idea was to start a bonfire indoors to stay warm.
